functions.description: Create the connection between your controller and the robots computer brain
Resets the robots path to its current location and heading

functions.short: Get the Block in (x, y, z)
functions.description:
Inspects and returns the type of block

Defaults to the block directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot

functions.short: Detect mobs within a range of the robot
functions.description:
Detects mobs nearby and returns a list of them

Can be powered up to increase the range

Requires the in game ID of the enemy

Works best if paired with detect as the ID is random
Turns the robot 90 degrees counterclockwise from current heading
Turns the robot 90 degrees clockwise from current heading

Make robot face a cardinal direction

Can be an int 0-3, string 'n' 'north' or a Facing object
Defaults to 1 block forward but can be a positive integer
Defaults to 1 block backward but can be any positive integer

Have the robot climb up a block or a ladder/vine

Defaults to 1 but can be any positive integer

functions.short: Have the robot descend a block
functions.description:
Used to decend a ladder or down a block

Defaults to 1 can be any positive integer

functions.short: Have the robot Place a block
functions.description:
Places a block from robot inventory

Defaults to the position directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot

functions.short: Have the robot Mine a block
functions.description: Defaults to the block directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot

Make the robot say something

Useful for debugging
Will jump forward, can only jump a 1 block gap!

functions.short: Have the robot interact with the game
functions.description:
Make the robot push buttons, open doors, etc.

Defaults to the block directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot

functions.short: Have the robot use its currently equipped tool
functions.description:
Make the robot use its currenly equipped tool.

Defaults to the block directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot

functions.short: Have the robot use an item from its inventory
functions.description:
Uses an item from robot inventory

Defaults to the position directly in front of the robot but can be within 1 block of robot
Equips an item assuming it is a tool (modded items have to subclass ItemTool)
Checks if the robot has the amount of an item in its inventory

functions.short: Have the robot craft an item
functions.description: If the robot has the materials, make it craft the passed in item
